attributes.action: give the Information Commissioner legal authority to inspect all central and local Government Bodies at will and to enforce their compliance with the Data Protection Act with strong sanctions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government Departments have treated citizens' information as their property to handle, share and disclose as they see fit. Our information is disclosed to Government for specific purposes such as taxation or  health. Citizens need independent assurance that their information is only shared for wider purposes under an independently policed regime.
